kpi.name: M1022C134

kpi_info.title: DCH DOWNLINK RECONFIG FAIL DUE TO TRANSPORT FOR BACKGROUND
kpi_info.use: The number of DCH reconfiguration failures for background NRT RB due to transport resources in SRNC in DL. UPDATED: When the DCH reconfiguration for background NRT RB in the downlink direction fails due to transport resources.

kpi.kpi_alias: DCH DOWNLINK RECONFIG FAIL DUE TO TRANSPORT FOR BACKGROUND
